text:
Marcella was diagnosed with #HIV before there was effective treatment
25 yrs later she’s living her best life. 
Inspired by #HIVTestweek  #itsASin &  #COVID19  #intensivecare @docstevetaylor compares  attitudes towards these 2 viruses #Stigma #vaccine
